narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Rocky Mountain Clinics LLC is a Pathology, Clinical Pathology/Laboratory Medicine provider based in Fort Collins, CO. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $13.1M in Medicaid payments across 78K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $13.1M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
